name: Cointracker
description:
For you who don't enjoy the bright theme of the free crypto tracker: cointracker.io

Improvements:

  • Darker colours to fit with your other trading apps
  • Gains text in bold
  • Button and Text links have the same colours

    • Donations always welcome to this LTC address: LNfjY6cLA2fHjLqqDRcVuTpu5buDpJHMTi

    If you use Coinbase, check out this matching theme: Dark Dashboard for Coinbase

user.name: Stefan Wessels
user.about: Designer & developer with over 20 years experience
